activities: International Patterns, Inc. receives personal information from customers and prospective customers via its website.  This information will be processed and stored in the United States
personaldata: Off line and manually processed data
recoursemech: International Patterns,Inc. will investigate and resolve any individual complaints and disputes involving this Policy and will abide by the law of any court of competent jurisdiction.   The American Arbitration Association will be available to investigate any unresolved complaints.
